name: nftgram
description: This project demonstrates a basic Hardhat use case. It comes with a sample contract, a test for that contract, and a Hardhat Ignition module that deploys that contract.

scripts.deploy:fork-ethereum: cross-env FORK_NETWORK=ethereum npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:fork-bsc: cross-env FORK_NETWORK=bsc npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:fork-polygon: cross-env FORK_NETWORK=polygon npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:fork-scroll: cross-env FORK_NETWORK=scroll npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:testnet:ethereumSepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network ethereumSepolia --deployment-id ethereumSepolia-deployment
scripts.deploy:testnet:bscTestnet: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network bscTestnet --deployment-id bscTestnet-deployment
scripts.deploy:testnet:scrollSepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network scrollSepolia --deployment-id scrollSepolia-deployment
scripts.deploy:mainnet:ethereum: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network ethereum --deployment-id ethereum-deployment
scripts.deploy:mainnet:bsc: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network bsc --deployment-id bsc-deployment
scripts.deploy:mainnet:polygon: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network polygon --deployment-id polygon-deployment
scripts.deploy:mainnet:scroll: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployModule.ts --network scroll --deployment-id scroll-deployment
scripts.upgrade:ethereumSepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network ethereumSepolia
scripts.upgrade:bscTestnet: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network bscTestnet
scripts.upgrade:scrollSepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network scrollSepolia
scripts.upgrade:ethereum: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network ethereum
scripts.upgrade:bsc: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network bsc
scripts.upgrade:polygon: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network polygon
scripts.upgrade:scroll: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgradeModule.ts --network scroll
